text: Official public holidays in Transnistria: == Official religious holidays == Date Holiday Local Name 7 January Orthodox Christmas Рождество 25 December Catholic Christmas Рождество Different each year Catholic Easter Different each year Orthodox Easter == Other official public holidays == Date Holiday Local Name 1-2 January New Year's Day Новый Год 23 February Defender of the Fatherland Day День защитника отечества 8 March International Women's Day Восьмое марта 1–2 May International Labour Day День международной солидарности трудящихся 9 May Victory Day День Победы 2 September Independence Day of Transnistria День независимости 7 November October Revolution Day День Октябрьской революции 24 December Constitution Day День Конституции 9 days after Orthodox Easter Commemoration Day ==References== Category:Transnistria Category:holidays
title: Public holidays in Transnistria
